GSP31tsc_simu:437: puruṣastu na kāryaṃ na vā kāraṇam /
GSP31tsc_simu:439: mahān ahaṃkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi sapta prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:440: pradhānād buddhirjāyata iti pradhānavikāraḥ saivāhaṅkāraṃ janayatīti prakṛtiḥ ahaṅkāro 'pi buddherjāyata iti vikṛtiḥ so 'pi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca tanmātrāṇi janayatīti prakṛtiḥ //
GSP31tsc_simu:441: tatra śabdatanamātramahaṃkārājjāyata iti vikṛtistasmādākāśaṃ jāyata iti śabdatanmātraṃ prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:442: tathā sparśatanmātramahaṃkārājjāyata iti vikṛtiḥ tadeva vāyuṃ janayatīti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:443: evaṃ rūpatanmātramahaṃkārājjāyata iti vikṛtiḥ tadeva tejo janayatīti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:445: tathā gandhatanmātramahaṃkārājjāyata iti vikṛtiḥ tadevāvaniṃ janayatīti prakṛtiḥ //
GSP31tsc_simu:446: etāni pañca tanmātrāṇi sūkṣmabhūtāni sthūlabhūtānāṃ kāraṇāni ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāraḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:447: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi ekādaśaṃ manaḥ pañca mahābhūtāni eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇo vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:452: śabdastāvat trividho bhavati vāgindriyaviṣayaḥ śrotraviṣayo buddhimātraviṣayaśca /
GSP31tsc_simu:453: teṣu kaṇṭhatālvādisthalāvacchinnaḥ śabdo vāgīndriyaviṣayaḥ tatkāryatvāt vāgindriyavyavahitaśrotrasthaśca śabdataḥ śabdaḥ śrotrasya viṣayastadgrāhyatvāt
GSP31tsc_simu:454: ghaṭa ityādipadāni tu buddhimātrasya viṣayaḥ vakṣyamāṇayuktyā buddhimātragrāhyatvāt //
GSP31tsc_simu:456: taddi padaṃ vāgindriyoccāryapratyekavarṇebhyo 'tiriktaṃ varṇānāmāśutaravināśitayā melanābhāvenaikaṃ padamiti vyavahāragocaratvāsambhavāt arthasmārakatvāsambhavācca
GSP31tsc_simu:457: asya ca sphoṭasya kāraṇamekaḥ prayatnaviśeṣaḥ prayatnabhedenoccāraṇe sati ekapadavyavahārābhāvādarthāpratyayācca
GSP31tsc_simu:458: tasya ca sphoṭasya vyañjaka ānupūrvīviśiṣṭatayā antyavarṇapratyayaḥ ataśca buddhereva
GSP31tsc_simu:461: ata eva sphoṭaḥ śrotreṇa grahītuṃ na śakyate ghottaraṭatvādirarūpiṇyā ānupūrvyāḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:462: śrotreṇa grahaṇāsambhavāt āśutaravināśitayā varṇānāṃ melanāsambhavāt pūrvapūrvavarṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ
GSP31tsc_simu:464: syādetat sphoṭavyañjakasyānupūrvīviśiṣṭacaramavarṇasyaiva padatvamarthapratyāyakatvaṃ vā 'stu alaṃ sphoṭena taddhetoreva tadastviti nyāyāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:465: etadeva sāṃkhyasūtreṇoktaṃ pratītyapratītibhyāṃ na sphoṭātmakaḥ śabda iti /
GSP31tsc_simu:470: lāghavāt taddhetoreva tadastviti nyāyasāmyāt eko ghaṭa ityādipratyayānāmapyekaṃ vanamityādipratyayavadupapatteḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:472: cet tulyaṃ sphoṭe 'pi ānupūrvyāḥ kṣaṇādyatīndriyaghaṭitatayā ānupūrvīviśiṣṭacaramavarṇātmakatve
GSP31tsc_simu:474: api ca sphoṭaśabdo 'smābhiḥ śrutipramāṇenaiva svargādivat kalpyate ityatastatra laukikapramāṇābhāve 'pi na kṣatiḥ //
GSP31tsc_simu:475: tathāhi praṇavasyākārokāramakārarūpamātrātrayaṃ brahmādidevatātrayātmakamuktvā praṇavaṃ devatātrayātiriktaparabrahmātmakaṃ caturthamātrāṃ śrutaya āmananti /
GSP31tsc_simu:476: sā caturthī mātrā varṇatrayādatiriktaḥ sphoṭa eva sambhavati saiva cārddhamātretyucyate rāśivadavibhaktayorvarṇapadayorvarṇā ekamarddhaṃ padaṃ cānyadarddhamityupapadyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:477: yathā cāvayavebhyo vivicyāvayavī na vyavahāryo bhavati evameva pratyekavarṇebhyo vivicya padamuccārayituṃ na śakyata iti /
GSP31tsc_simu:478: ataḥ smaryate “arddhamātrā sthitā nityā yānuccāryā viśeṣata” iti //
GSP31tsc_simu:481: praṇave uccāryamāṇe śaṅkhanādaveṇunādādivadyaḥ svaraviśeṣo bhavati sa nādaḥ yā ca nādasyoparamāvasthā atisūkṣmā sā śūnyatulyatayā bindurucyata iti /
GSP31tsc_simu:482: tasmādavayavebhyo 'vayavīva varṇebhyo 'tiriktaṃ padaṃ tadeva sphoṭa iti siddham /
GSP31tsc_simu:483: nanvevaṃ vākyamapi sphoṭaḥ syāditi cenna bādhakābhāve satīṣyatāmiti dik //
GSP31tsc_simu:486: prakṛtipuruṣau vidyamānāvapi nopalabhyete sūkṣmatvāt yathākāśe dhūmoṣmanīhāraparamāṇavaḥ santo 'pi nopalabhyante /
GSP31tsc_simu:488: triguṇapradhānajanyaṃ mahadādikāryaṃ kiñcitprakṛtisadṛśaṃ kiñcidvikṛtisadṛśaṃ loke ubhayathā puttrarūpakāryadarśanāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:489: tacca kāryaṃ sat nāsat na sadasat nānirvacanīyam atyantāsattve sikatābhyo 'pi tailamutpadyeta /
GSP31tsc_simu:490: anyau ca pakṣau viruddhāveva avyaktasañjñaṃ pradhānaṃ svatantraṃ vyāpi nityaṃ ca vyaktasañjñaṃ kāryamasvatantramavyāpi anityaṃ ca /
GSP31tsc_simu:492: trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ kāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ taccaikaṃ lāghavāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:498: kāryasya sukhaduḥkhamohajanakatvena tatra kāraṇībhūtāni sattvarajastamāṃsi anumeyāni /
GSP31tsc_simu:499: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yathākramaṃ bhartṛsapatnīviṭeṣu sukhaduḥkhamohajanakatvaṃ kāminyāḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:500: triguṇamaye 'pi kārye yadā sattvamudriktaṃ bhavati janādṛṣṭāt tadā rajastamasī abhibhūya svakāryaṃ sukhaṃ janayati /
GSP31tsc_simu:501: evaṃ yadā raja udriktaṃ bhavati tadā sattvatamasī abhibhūya svakāryaṃ janayati duḥkham /
GSP31tsc_simu:502: evaṃ yadā tama udriktaṃ bhavati tadā sattvarajasī abhibhūya svakāryaṃ mohaṃ janayati //
GSP31tsc_simu:504: tathāhi tatra ādhyātmikaṃ dvirūpaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ceti /
GSP31tsc_simu:508: divaḥ prabhavati taddaivaṃ tadadhikṛtya yajjāyate tadādhidaivikaṃ śītoṣṇavātavarṣāśanipātajam /
GSP31tsc_simu:509: samuditatantavaḥ paṭamiva guṇasamudāyātmakaṃ pradhānam mahadādikāryaṃ janayati /
GSP31tsc_simu:510: ekarasamapi yathā ākāśasalilaṃ vāpyādau patitaṃ sat vāpyādisaṃśleṣāt rasāntaramāpadyate tathā ekarūpādapi pradhānāddevādayaḥ krameṇa sukhino duḥkhino atyantamūḍhāśca bhavanti /
GSP31tsc_simu:517: sa ca nānā janmamaraṇakaraṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ bhedāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:519: ekasya maraṇe sarve mriyeran yadyeka eva ātmā syāt ekasya ca janmani sarve jāyeran ekasya karaṇavaikalye sarve karaṇavaikalyavantaḥ syuḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:525: ata eva idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na bhramaḥ kiṃtu svarūpataḥ arthataśca aviviktaṃ jñānadvayam /
GSP31tsc_simu:526: yasya yādṛśamidaṃ rajatamiti rajatajñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ tasya tādṛśameva jagaditi nirṇayaḥ //
GSP31tsc_simu:527: ata eva vastutastāttviko 'nyathābhāvaḥ pariṇāma ityeva lakṣaṇalakṣitaḥ pariṇāmo 'ṅgākṛtaḥ sa ca puruṣaḥ pratiśarīraṃ nānetyatrādi sma avikāritvāt
GSP31tsc_simu:533: darśanaśaktimataḥ kriyāśaktirahitasya puruṣasya pradhānena saha saṃyogaḥ mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ pradhānaṃ draṣṭum /
GSP31tsc_simu:534: darśanaśaktirahitasya kriyāśaktimataḥ pradhānasyāpi puruṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ mokṣārthaṃ puruṣasya bhinnatvena vyaktāvyaktapuruṣajñāne jāte pradhānasya mokṣo bhavati /
GSP31tsc_simu:536: na ca nityasukhagocarasyāvidyādiyatkiñcidāvaraṇabhaṅga eva puruṣārtho vācyaḥ sukhānubhavasyaiva puruṣārthatvāccaitanyanityatvenāvaraṇasyāpi asambhavācca /
GSP31tsc_simu:542: sāṃkhyasūtramapi duḥkhanivṛttirgauṇa iti vimuktipraśaṃsā mandānāmiti ca /
GSP31tsc_simu:543: ānandāvāptistu gauṇamokṣo brahmaloke bhavati iti paścāt kṛtārthayoḥ pradhānapuruṣayorviyogo bhavati andhapaṅgusaṃyogavat /
GSP31tsc_simu:544: tathāhi ekaḥ paṅguraparaścāndhaḥ dvāvapyetau duṣṭe pathi gacchantau mahatā sārthena
GSP31tsc_simu:545: saha daivādbandhubhiḥ parityaktau yathāyogaṃ gamanaśaktidarśanaśaktirahitau darśanārthaṃ
GSP31tsc_simu:547: tathā cāndhena paṅguḥ skandhamāropitastaddarśitamārgeṇāndho yāti paṅguścāndhaskandhārūḍhaḥ san yāti /
GSP31tsc_simu:548: paścāt svasvadeśaprāptyanantaraṃ kṛtārthau santau viyuktau bhavataḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:549: tathā ca pradhānaṃ puruṣasya mokṣaṃ kṛtvā nivarttate /
GSP31tsc_simu:553: na kriyāveśātmā sa ca puruṣaḥ anādyavivekāt saṃsarati /
GSP31tsc_simu:554: sacchāstraśravaṇena gurvanugraheṇa ca nirvicikitso vivekajñāne jāte mucyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:559: yo hi vaikarikaḥ sa eva sāttvikaḥ yo bhūtādiḥ sa eva tāmasaḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:560: yo hi taijasaḥ sa eva rājasaḥ tatra vaikārikādahaṅkārādekādaśendriyāṇi tadabhimāninyo devatāśca jāyante /
GSP31tsc_simu:562: etadgaṇadvayasya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vaikārikādbhūtādeścāhaṃkārājjātatvāt kathaṃ punarutpattirucyata iti cecchṛṇu /
GSP31tsc_simu:563: yadā rajastamasī abhibhūya sattvaguṇa utkaṭo vaikarikasañjñāṃ labhamāno 'haṃkāro
GSP31tsc_simu:566: yadā ca sattvarajasī abhibhūya tamoguṇotkaṭo bhūtādistaijasāhaṃkārasya rūpaṃ sahāyīkṛtya
GSP31tsc_simu:567: tanmātrapañcakaṃ pravṛttidharmakaṃ karoti tadā tattanmātrapañcakaṃ svasāhāyyenaiva
GSP31tsc_simu:568: taijasenāpi kṛtamityucyate tasmāt pravṛttidharmakāt tattanmātrapañcakād bhūtapañcakamutpadyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:572: vaikārikasya bhūtādeśca svasvapravṛttidharmakakāryadvayasya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ janane taijasāhaṃkārasya sāhāyyam /
GSP31tsc_simu:576: karma kurvantīti karmendriyāṇi tāni ca vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāni /
GSP31tsc_simu:578: mano buddhīndriyaṃ karmendriyaṃ ca yato buddhīndriyāṇāṃ vṛttiṃ saṃkalpayati karmendriyāṇāṃ ca ata ubhayātmakaṃ manaḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:580: na ca prakṛtidharmā eva santvadṛṣṭādaya iti vācyam anyaniṣṭhādṛṣṭādibhiranyatra sukhaduḥkhādyutpāde 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:581: tacca nāṇu saṃbhavati yogināṃ sarvāvacchedena ekadā 'khilasākṣātkārāsambhavāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:582: na ca yogināṃ yogajadharma eva pratyāsattiḥ syāt saṃyogasaṃyuktasamavāyādilaukikapratyāsattyaivopapattau sannikarṣāntarakalpane mānābhāvāt gauravācca anyonyavyabhicārācca /
GSP31tsc_simu:585: kriyate suṣuptau tamaso vṛttipratibandhakatvasiddheriti nāpyantaḥkaraṇaṃ madhyamaparimāṇamātraṃ
GSP31tsc_simu:592: ata eva sāṃkhyasūtram “na vyāpakaṃ manaḥ karaṇatvā“diti /
GSP31tsc_simu:593: tadgatiśruteriti veti kiṃ caivaṃ sati lāghavāt caitanyasyaivāvaraṇakalpanamucitaṃ kimarthaṃ vibhvantaḥkaraṇaṃ parikalpyate tatra jñānapratibandhakamāvaraṇaṃ kalpyate //
GSP31tsc_simu:596: kāryāntaḥkaraṇasya svato 'pi gatirupapadyate kāryakāraṇarūpeṇāntaḥkaraṇadvaitaṃ ca sāṃkhyairapyeṣṭavyam kevalakāryatve 'ntaḥkaraṇadharmatvaṃ dharmādīnāmiti sāṃkhyasūtrānupapatteḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:597: kevalanityatve ca mahadādyutpattisūtrānupapatteḥ yattūktaṃ caitanyasyaivāvaraṇakalpanaṃ yuktamiti tadayuktam /
GSP31tsc_simu:599: na ca caitanyasyārthasambandha eva pratibimbādirūpe pratibandhakaṃ kalpanīyamiti
GSP31tsc_simu:600: vācyam evamapyātmadarśanānupapatteḥ karaṇadvāraṃ vinā svasmin pratibimbādirūpeṇa
GSP31tsc_simu:602: api ca icchākṛtyādyādhāratayā 'ntaḥkaraṇe siddhe svapnādāvantardṛśyamānaghaṭādayo 'pi tasyaiva pariṇāmāḥ kalpyante kāryakāraṇayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaucityāt
GSP31tsc_simu:603: evaṃ ca ghaṭādyākārapariṇatāścaitanye bhāsante tadavibhāgenaiva bāhyaghaṭādikaṃ bhāsate
GSP31tsc_simu:606: nanvantaḥkaraṇasya vibhutve sati kathaṃ kāryatvaṃ syāditi cenna vibhvyā api ākaśaprakṛteḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:610: etānyekādaśa vaikṛtāhaṃkārājjātāni ityavādi smaiva buddhipratibimbitamarthaṃ puruṣa upalabhate /
GSP31tsc_simu:615: pañcaviṃśatitattvaireva jagadvyāptaṃ na nyūnairnādhikaiśca vatsavivṛddhinimittaṃ kṣīrasyeva ajñasyāpi pradhānasya puruṣamokṣārthaṃ pravṛttirucitaiva
GSP31tsc_simu:617: samudāyaḥ trayoviṃśatitattvamadhye pañcabhūtāni varjayitvā ahaṃkāraṃ ca buddhau praveśya
GSP31tsc_simu:619: tacca sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ sargādāvutpadya prākṛtapralayaparyantaṃ tiṣṭhati tena caiveha lokaparalokayoḥ saṃsaraṇaṃ jīvānāṃ bhavati /
GSP31tsc_simu:620: prāṇaśca buddhereva vṛttibheda ityato na liṅgaśarīrāt pṛthaṅ nirdiśyate tasya ca
GSP31tsc_simu:621: liṅgaśarīrasya sūkṣmāṇi pañca bhūtāni āśrayaścitrādivadāśrayaṃ vinā paramasūkṣmasya
GSP31tsc_simu:623: idaṃ ca liṅgaśarīramādau svayaṃbhuva upādhibhūtamekameva jāyate tasyaiva virāḍākhyavakṣyamāṇasthūlaśarīravat
GSP31tsc_simu:624: tataśca vyaṣṭijīvānāmupādhibhūtāni vyaṣṭiliṅgaśarīrāṇi tadaṃśabhūtāni tato vibhajyante /
GSP31tsc_simu:630: ṣaṇṇāmiti ṣaḍindriyaṃ samastaliṅgaśarīropalakṣakam tathā ca svayambhūḥ svaliṅgaśarīrāvayavān
GSP31tsc_simu:631: sūkṣmānalpān ātmamātrāsu svāṃśacetaneṣu saṃyojya sarvaprāṇinaḥ sasarjjetyartha iti liṅgaśarīram /
GSP31tsc_simu:633: madhye vyomno 'pi daśaguṇitasya madhye vāyurvāyorapi daśaguṇitasya madhye tejastejaso
GSP31tsc_simu:634: 'pi daśaguṇitasya madhye jalaṃ jalasyāpi daśaguṇitasya madhye pṛthivī samutpadyate
GSP31tsc_simu:635: saiva ca sthūlaśarīrasya bījaṃ tadeva ca pṛthivīrūpaṃ bījamaṇḍarūpeṇa pariṇamate
GSP31tsc_simu:636: tasyāpi daśaguṇitāṇḍarūpasya pṛthivyāvaraṇasya madhye caturdaśabhuvanātmakaṃ svayambhuvaḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:637: sthūlaśarīraṃ tatsaṃkalpādevotpadyate tenaiva śarīreṇa svayambhūrnārāyaṇa ityucyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:643: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:645: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:646: tā yadasyāyanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP31tsc_simu:648: tata eva cādipuruṣāt vyaṣṭipuruṣāṇāṃ vibhāgādante ca tatraiva layāt sa eva caika
GSP31tsc_simu:649: ātmeti śrutismṛtyorvyavahriyate ato na vyavahāraparatayā nārāyaṇa eva sarvabhūtānāmātmetyādiśrutismṛtivirodha iti /
GSP31tsc_simu:650: tataśca sa nārāyaṇo virāṭśarīrī svanābhikamalakarṇikāsthānīyasya sumerorupari caturmukhākhyaṃ svayaṃbhuvaṃ sṛṣṭvā taddvārānyānapi vyaṣṭiśarīriṇaḥ sthāvarāntān sasarja taduktam -
GSP31tsc_simu:653: yattu śeṣaśāyino nārāyaṇasya nābhikamalaśrotracakṣurādibhyaścaturmukhasyāvirbhāvaḥ śrūyate taddainyandinasargeṣveva kalpabhedena mantavyam /
GSP31tsc_simu:654: dainandinapralayeṣveva hi nārāyaṇaśarīre praviśyaikībhūya suptānāṃ devānāṃ caturmukhādikrameṇāvirbhāvaḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:655: śeṣaśāyinaḥ sakāśāt ghaṭate na tvādisargeṣu dainandinapralaya eva līlāvigraheṇa śayanāditi //
GSP31tsc_simu:656: tadevaṃ saṃkṣepataścaturviṃśatitattvāni teṣāṃ sṛṣṭikṣayaṃ prayojanaṃ coktam /
GSP31tsc_simu:662: ete ca sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārarūpāḥ sthūlā eva pariṇāmāścaturviṃśatitattvānāṃ kūṭasthapuruṣavivekāya pradarśitāḥ sūkṣmā apyanye pratikṣaṇapariṇāmā eteṣāṃ smaryante /
GSP31tsc_simu:666: tataśca tasmādvirajya ātmaiva paramārthasatyo duḥkhabhīrubhirdraṣṭavyaḥ taduktam /
GSP31tsc_simu:673: kṛtvā cākṣaratāṃ prāpya jahāti mṛtyujanmanī // iti /
GSP31tsc_simu:679: tadeva saktaḥ saha karmaṇaiti liṅgaṃ mano yatra niṣaktamasyeti śrutāvabhimānarāgadveṣādijanyasya
GSP31tsc_simu:681: yatra yatra mano dehī dhārayet sakalaṃ dhiyā /
GSP31tsc_simu:682: snehād dveṣād guṇādvāpi yāti tattatsarūpatām // iti smṛteḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:688: nikhilā savikāreyaṃ tyak taprāyā hi carmavat //
GSP31tsc_simu:692: tadvivekajñānadvāraiva mokṣakāraṇaṃ bhavati na tu sākṣāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:693: avidyānivartakatvābhāvāt ahaṃ gauraḥ karttā sukhī duḥkhītyādijñānameva hyavidyā saṃsārānarthahetutayā
GSP31tsc_simu:694: śrutismṛtinyāyasiddhā tasyāśca nivarttikā nāhaṃ gaura ityādirūpā vivekakhyātireva
GSP31tsc_simu:697: kiñca yathoktābhāvajñāne grāhyajñānavirodhitvasyāvaśyakatayā nirvikalpajñānasya bhramanivartakatvaṃ na pṛthak kalpyate gauravāt //
GSP31tsc_simu:698: api ca athāta ādeśo neti neti na hyetasmāditi netyanyat paramastītyādiśrutyā vivekopadeśāpekṣayottama upadeśo nāstītyucyate //
GSP31tsc_simu:700: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye viduryānti te param //
GSP31tsc_simu:701: iti gītāvākyaiśca vivekajñānasyaiva mokṣahetutvamucyate 'to vivekajñānameva sākṣādavidyānivṛttyā mokṣahetuḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:703: etena sarvabhūteṣu samatājñānam ātmanaḥ sarvātmakatvādijñānaṃ ca śrutismṛtyorgīyamānaṃ vivekajñānasyaiva śeṣabhūtaṃ sarvadarśaneṣu mantavyam
GSP31tsc_simu:704: jñānāntarāṇāṃ sākṣādabhimānānivartakatvāt brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ tvayaṃ viśeṣo yatparamātmavivekaśeṣatvam /
GSP31tsc_simu:706: vivekakhyātestvavidyānāśakatvameva na tu śuktirajatavivekadarśina iva punarbhramadarśanāt pratibandhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte paṭalakāmādidoṣabāhulyāt punarujjīvanaṃ bhramasya /
GSP31tsc_simu:707: atra ca anātmanyātmābhimāne 'nādivāsanaiva doṣaḥ sarvāstikasaṃmataḥ jātamātrasyābhimāne
GSP31tsc_simu:709: tadaiva vivekasākṣātkāraniṣṭhocyate tatpūrvamavaśyaṃ vāsanāleśato mithyāṃśasya kasyāpyātmani
GSP31tsc_simu:710: bhānāt tasyāṃ ca vivekakhyātiniṣṭhāyāṃ jātāyāṃ na punarabhimānaḥ sambhavati vāsanākhyadoṣābhāvāditi /
GSP31tsc_simu:711: yadi tu buddhipuruṣayoranyonyapratibimbanādikamavivekakāraṇaṃ doṣa iṣyate tadā tu
GSP31tsc_simu:712: taṃ doṣaṃ bādhitvaiva vivekasākṣātkāra udita iti na tasya punarbhramahetutvaṃ phalabalena
GSP31tsc_simu:718: ghaṭadraṣṭā ghaṭādbhinnaḥ sarvathā na ghaṭo yathā /
GSP31tsc_simu:720: ātmā vā are draṣṭavya ityatra tu na ātmano dṛśyatvaṃ vṛttivyāpyatve 'pi phalavyāpyatvarūpaṃ
GSP31tsc_simu:721: yattu bauddhairapi sukhaduḥkhādimattvenāpi buddhiranubhūyamānā svaprakāśatayā caitanyavyāpyā
GSP31tsc_simu:722: na bhavati yathā vedāntināmahamityanubhūyamāno 'pyātmā caitanyākhyaphalavyāpyo na
GSP31tsc_simu:727: yadyapi pradhānapuruṣau vibhū tathāpi prakṛtireva liṅgavyavasthāṃ karoti /
GSP31tsc_simu:728: liṅgaṃ sūkṣmaiḥ paramāṇubhistanmātrairupacitaṃ mānuṣādiṣu vyavatiṣṭhate naṭavat yathā
GSP31tsc_simu:729: naṭaḥ svarūpeṇa eko 'pi veṣāntareṇa nānārūpaḥ tathā liṅgamudarāntaḥ praviśya hastī
GSP31tsc_simu:730: strī pumāniti bhavati pañcaviparyayasaṃjñā bhavati yathā tamo moho mahāmohastāmiśro 'ndhatāmiśra iti /
GSP31tsc_simu:733: tacca tattvajñānaṃ guroḥ sakāśāt śāstraśravaṇenaitādṛśaṃ jāyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:734: tathāhi pradhānādanyaḥ puruṣaḥ anyā buddhiḥ anyo 'haṃkāraḥ anyāni tanmātrāṇi indriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ceti /
GSP31tsc_simu:735: sarvaṃ kāryaṃ triguṇātmakamapi udriktaguṇāpekṣayā sāttvikādiśabdavyapadeśabhāk cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ nānāyoniṣu jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ cetayate prāpnotītyarthaḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:736: yāvat tattvajñānena liṅgaśarīraṃ na nivarttate tāvat sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ pratijanma nūtanaṃ jāyate naśyati ca /
GSP31tsc_simu:738: kāryaṃ puruṣasya bhogāya mokṣāya cārabhate prakṛtiḥ puruṣasya bhedena buddhyahaṃkārādi
GSP31tsc_simu:740: yathā narttakī śṛṅgārādirasairhāsyādibhāvaiśca nibaddhagītādīni raṅgasya darśayitvā nivarttate kṛtārthatvāt tadvat /
GSP31tsc_simu:741: kiñca prakṛtirguṇavatī aguṇasya puṃsaḥ jagadyonibhāvena sukhaduḥkhamohātmakena śabdādiviṣayabhāvena
GSP31tsc_simu:743: tvamanya iti nivartate sumitravat ātmanaḥ pratyupakāraṃ necchati /
GSP31tsc_simu:744: sargasya neśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ na svabhāvo na kālaḥ kālo 'pi yogināṃ kṣaṇarūpa eva na
GSP31tsc_simu:745: tu nyāyavaiśeṣikayorivātmavadakhaṇḍo nitya eko lāghavāt sa eva tattadupādyavacchinnaḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:748: sāṃkhyaistu dikkālāvākāśādibhya iti sūtritaṃ mahākālo vā kṣaṇādirvā pṛthak padārtho nāsti kintvākāśamevopādhibhirviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇādimahākālāntavyavahāraṃ kurute iti manyate /
GSP31tsc_simu:749: tadetanmatadvayamapyasamañjasamityāha yogī sthireṇa kenāpyupādhinā mahākālākāśābhyāṃ kṣaṇavyavahārasyāsambhavāt /
GSP31tsc_simu:750: tathāhi uttaradeśasaṃyogāvacchinnā paramāṇvādikriyā anyadvā etādṛśaṃ kiñcinmahākālākāśayoḥ
GSP31tsc_simu:751: kṣaṇarūpatāyāmupādhiḥ parairiṣyate tatra uktaṃ saṃyogaviśiṣṭakriyādikaṃ cet viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇatatsambandhamātraṃ
GSP31tsc_simu:752: tarhi trayāṇāmaparaiḥ sthiratvābhyupagamāt na taiḥ kṣaṇavyavahāraḥ sambhavati yadi
GSP31tsc_simu:753: ca tattebhyo 'tiriktamiṣyate na tu tanmahākāla ākāśaṃ vā tenaiva kṣaṇavyavahāropapattau
GSP31tsc_simu:755: kṣaṇaḥ prakṛterevātibhaṅguraḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣa ityato na prakṛtipuruṣātiriktatvāpattiḥ /
GSP31tsc_simu:757: natvakhaṇḍo mahākālo 'sti pramāṇābhāvāt adyatyādivyavahāraḥ kṣaṇapracayenaiva kālanityatvaśrutismṛtayastu
GSP31tsc_simu:758: pravāhanityatāparā iti tasmādāvaśyakatvāt kṣaṇātmaka eva kālo nākhaṇḍo mahākālo 'sti
GSP31tsc_simu:760: puruṣo na badhyate na mucyate nāpi saṃsaratīti kiṃ tu nānāśrayā prakṛtireva tatheti sarvaṃ samañjasam //
